alert.note: Alert for Clark; Fayette; Greene; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE, EASTERN CLARK, EASTERN GREENE AND MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springfield to near South Charleston to near Xenia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Xenia, London, West Jefferson, Cedarville, Jamestown, South Charleston, Jeffersonville, Choctaw Lake, Wilberforce, Harmony, Lisbon, New Jasper, Brighton, Lafayette, South Vienna, South Solon, Midway, Catawba and Octa. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 55 and 81. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 64 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
